data.title: Tracked Down: Julian Edelman, Linda Pizzuti Henry, Daisuke Matsuzaka, and more…
data.meta_description: New England Patriots Julian Edelman and Devin McCourty spreading cheer to the patients and donors at Dana-Farber Cancer Institute’s Kraft Family Blood Donor Center … Red Sox spouses Linda Pizzuti Henry and Sarah Atchison preparing and serving a meal at the Women’s Lunch Place … The Food Network’s “Diners, Drive-ins & Dives” host Guy Fieri […]
data.text:
New England Patriots Julian Edelman and Devin McCourty spreading cheer to the patients and donors at Dana-Farber Cancer Institute’s Kraft Family Blood Donor Center … Red Sox spouses Linda Pizzuti Henry and Sarah Atchison preparing and serving a meal at the Women’s Lunch Place … The Food Network’s “Diners, Drive-ins & Dives” host Guy Fieri filming at Cutty’s in Brookline … Sox pitcher Daisuke Matsuzaka accepting a cherry blossom tree from Consul General of Japan Takeshi Hikihara and his wife Hammi at Fenway Park, a gift for the ballpark’s 100th anniversary … New England Revolution goalie Matt Reis cooking and chatting with volunteers at Community Servings in Jamaica Plain … “Two Broke Girls” star Kat Dennings and her BF, Nick Zano, catching a New York-bound Acela at South Station … Go-Go’s gal Belinda Carlisle checking out of the Nine Zero Hotel …

Originally Published: May 16, 2012 at 12:00 a.m.
